attributes.additional_details: I am trying to make as many people as possible aware of the importance of making sure that child locks are put on the back doors of all vehicles. If they had been put on the vehicle Levi was travelling in, then he would not of opened the door and fell to his death.

rejection.details: While we have great sympathy for your loss, the e-petition system is designed to call for central government to take action.  If you feel that there is something which the Government should be doing to help in this regard, please resubmit your petition, making it clear what you are asking for.
